title: Calories in Dunkin Donuts Creamer
meta_description: Discover calories in Dunkin Donuts creamer per serving, including fat, carbs, sugars, and nutrition facts for your coffee routine.
assumptions: Original flavor, non-dairy coffee creamer; per 1 tablespoon (15 ml) serving; no added sugars beyond formula.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and serving size; always check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of Dunkin Donuts creamer contains 35 calories and 3 g of fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with product packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Dunkin Donuts creamer?
faqs.a: About 35 calories per 1 tbsp serving of original flavor.

faqs.q: Does Dunkin Donuts creamer have sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, 2 g of sugars per tbsp, mostly from added sweeteners.
Most varieties are non-dairy; confirm on label for specifics.

faqs.q: How much fat is in Dunkin Donuts creamer?
faqs.a: 3 g total fat per tbsp, with 2.5 g saturated.

faqs.q: Calories in flavored Dunkin Donuts creamer?
faqs.a: Flavored options like hazelnut or vanilla add 5â€“10 calories per tbsp over original.
